rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update
export SHELL="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/sh" export PKG_CONFIG="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config"
export GUILE_LIBS="`${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config --libs guile-2.0`" export GUILE_CFLAGS="`${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config --cflags guile-2.0`"
# HACK: fix hard-coded pkg-config call in configure script. sed -i 's/`pkg-config/`$PKG_CONFIG/g' configure # HACK: fix incompatible mktemp usage sed -i 's/--suffix=.tdir//g' $(grep 'mktemp --suffix=.tdir' * -r | cut -d: -f1 | sort -u)
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-silent-rules \ --enable-timeout=78 \ --with-libxml2-libs="`${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config --libs libxml-2.0`" \ --with-libxml2-cflags="`${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config --cflags libxml-2.0`" \ --disable-nls \ --disable-rpath \ --with-packager="Bolt"
rules.install:
export SHELL="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/sh"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make top_srcdir="`pwd`" top_builddir="`pwd`" \ DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
